post.body: WOW! I guess using it as the last word was the only way... very NIIIIIIIICE...
Watcha' poppin...? 2 nite is pagne/date nite for us... maybe a little German Sekt...
Good for you... Now you're ready for the Weekend!!!
Right on.. following both...
Right on... what'cha poppin'...?
Cool... I have 20/5... blazing speed, no interruptions... really hope they get you fixed... if u get the TV, the HD is GR8!
Ya... TJ's in Vegas has it, and most any store in AZ has it there...
But if you ever go to Vegas or AZ, you can get SW there...
yep... no SW can be exported to Cali, per NB... I agree with you on MW.. I drink Pyramid or Blue Moon instead...
PDX.. is that Portland? Bummer... hope they fix ya up.. do u have Internet? TV? Phone? we have all 3... no problems ever
they still have it-I talked with a NB rep 2 yrs ago... Cali mkt didn't like it, so they came up with Mothership Wit for Cali
where u located...? Have it here in HB... LOVE IT! What problems r u having...?
DAMN! those sound soooo good right now... wish I were closer...
and our spray-on tans 8-)
Same here when it rains.. and the news goes crazy when we get any rain... STORM WATCH... and the total is 1/4 inch or less ;-)
Yo GRRL! wish we could get snow... never happens though... Hmm... oh ya, it's the WARM WEATHER!
Will do! Always like a nice Colorado beer... a little partial to Sunshine Wheat myself...
Must have been 'Martha's Vineyard', eh...? Good stuff... their Bella Oaks Cab is not too shabby either...
Been to Heitz... one of the last 'free' tastings offered in Napa...
The SCAM was the speculators who drove up the price per barrel... that then lowered our demand DRASTICALLY...
Mmm... sounds good...
Awesome... hope u get a good sunset...
Good ol' Supply vs. Demand... no demand... so supply is high, hence lower prices to lower supply...
Pinot with your Salmon...?
Awesome... so where in HB is the wedding and reception...?
Mmm... sounds good... you and Derek have a GR8 evening...!
WAs this while he was signing the books...? Saw his Tweet... just too busy... getting ready to start the brisket...
WooHoo... Kings Win! Boy, are we lucky...
CLeaning the house for guests, then making Zin-Braised Brisket... Mmm, Mmm, Good!
Ya, quite a few folks are going the art-route these days. we just luv the smell, plus i only had art growing up, so i'm livin ;-)
As Usual... AWESOME!
Watched Linda on her first UStream demo last night... while she was painting... pretty cool.. .she said maybe this afternoon...
Hope u get the SNOW... jealous...
Hey Man... it's Friday... all is good... and you..?
YO! We're haning out here: http://tinyurl.com/6z973v
READY!
DAMN! And I just ate lunch.. maybe some PIZZA later... gr8 job as always...
U KNOW it Bro! be there...
I think I saw a Tweet that Twitter deleted people who Spam...
Going Gr8 so far... was 39 this morning, now 50... today's my last day, then I'm off until Jan 5, using only 3 vac days... YEAH!!
And to you, Claud... TGIF!!!
Ethics
DUDE! Take a break and catch some ZZZZZZZZs...
Come on out... we've got lots of fun in the sun out here.... ;-)
I can get a 2005 for $59.95, so I'm anxious to hear...
You know you are... I can't wait to read about!
Just cold here... hit 39 at 6:30... BRRRRRRRRR....
Morn' Ana... TGIF! What's Shakin'...?
Did you post the notes...?
Yo Derek! How was your New Years...? i'll let you know if there's any good wines from the tasting... and of course the CHEESE..
They're probably using monitter... check it out: http://monitter.com/
Boy... u DID party...! By 4 am... I was nite-nite for 3 hours... ;-)
WOW! sounds like you had some fun... PS was cool as always... didn't pay for it too much as I drove home in the afternoon...
Yo WIZ! Doing good... how was your New Years...?
Yo, Claud! Happy New Year! How was your party...?
Beer Backgammon... even better...
Thx Claud... and to YOU!... as for drunk twittering... one never knows... ;-)
Yes... close for you... r u ready...?
I only see a ? ...
Linda... you have a great New Year... check out my last blog entry of 2008: http://surfcityjay.blogspot.com/
And 2 U! Have a great time 2 nite...
Can't wait! Have a SAFE and Happy New Year!!!
Yes... when you wear shorts most of the year... weather in the 40s seems mighty cold...
Did they find Caylee...? of so, Reaaaaaaaal Saaaaaad.... http://www.foxnews.com/
OK... off to cook c'ya all tomorrow...
Happy Saturday... hope everyone is having a great weekend so far...
Got the tree in the house after a nite of soaking... adding the decorations 2nite...
RT: OK HERE IT IS! http://tinyurl.com/loveuguys only valid for 12 hrs. Free shipping for Twitters Enjoy it! and watch the VIDEO! ReTweet it
RT: @garyvee Come and hang out http://tinyurl.com/6z973v and talk biz and watch me tape the Twitter free shipping offer
Off to the G&G Wine Club... you wish you were there... = ) Ciao!
HB gets their first clean sheet vs. Ocean View, 4-0!
What special bottle(s) are you opening over the Holidays...? Bringing a 1986 Dominus to my Pa-In-Law's Xmas Nite... Hope he likes it...!
Going to the Wine Country in Signal Hill at 1... 10 Red wines, each paired with cheese... YUMM!
WOW! I still have no work until Monday... WooHoo!!!
OK... off to Palm Springs in 30... all... have a SAFE and HAPPY NEW YEAR!!!
What a 2008... see ya in 2009... Ciao for now... http://surfcityjay.blogspot.com/
12 hours till 2009... can't wait for a better year... I hope...
